DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH : INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS
DOC.TEXT: China to Remove Some Import Controls : On the eve of a trip to Europe and the United States to discuss China ' s bid to enter the General_Agreement on Tariffs and Trade , Assistant Trade Minister Long Yongtu said Beijing is abolishing import quotas and license requirements for 195 goods in a bid to bring its trade system closer to international standards . Import controls on 30 items will be lifted by year ' s end and the rest by the end of 1995 , Long said .
